news_header: OP Group's operating profit increased by 21% last year to around EUR 2.5 billion.
news_original_title: OP-ryhmän liikevoitto kasvoi viidenneksellä viime vuonna
news_text: In 2023, OP Group's operating profit was approximately EUR 2.1 billion. CEO Timo Ritakallio stated that 2024 was very successful, with strong performance across all three business segments. Despite uncertainty in 2023, Finland's economic recovery began at the end of the year.
